title: Four in every thousand
creator_credit: Greg Reading, Gil Brealey and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Westhaven Centre for the mentally handicapped at Dubbo, N.S.W., provides care and training for moderately and severely retarded children and adults, partly self-supporting as a farm and sheltered workshop.
